channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mark Sanchez, Ex-N.F.L. Quarterback, Is Charged in Stabbing in Indianapolis
item.description: Mr. Sanchez, who works as a Fox Sports commentator, was charged with battery on Saturday, the police said. He was in stable condition after being inju...

item.title: Federal Agent in Chicago Shot Motorist in Confrontation, Officials Say
item.description: The clash touched off more protests in the city over immigration enforcement. The Illinois governor said National Guard troops could be deployed soon ...

item.title: Judge Blocks Trump’s Deployment of National Guard in Portland, Ore.

item.title: For Netanyahu, Trump’s Nod to Peace Puts Him in a Tough Spot
item.description: The Israeli leader thought he had a plan from the U.S. president that would have represented total victory over Hamas. Suddenly, it looks as though he...

item.title: During a White House meeting, Hakeem Jeffries spotted a ‘Trump 2028’ hat and asked JD Vance ‘Hey, bro, you got a problem with this?’
item.description: “It was the randomest thing in the world, because we’re sitting there, we’re having a serious conversation, and all of a sudden these two red hats app...

item.title: The U.S. may mint a coin with Trump’s face despite a law he signed that prohibits collectibles with similar likenesses
item.description: A draft design harkens back to an assassination attempt during his 2024 presidential campaign and reads “FIGHT, FIGHT, FIGHT”

item.title: Trade and legal experts see up to 80% odds that the Supreme Court will rule against Trump’s global tariffs
item.description: "Legal experts point out that none of Trump’s three appointed justices is distinctively 'Trumpy,' and they have been less predictable than Republicans...

item.title: Trump to federalize 300 members of the Illinois National Guard ahead of expected deployment to Democratic state
item.description: “This morning, the Trump Administration’s Department of War gave me an ultimatum: call up your troops, or we will,” Pritzker said in a statement.

item.title: Stellantis said to plan $10 billion in U.S. turnaround investments
item.description: The carmaker may announce in the coming weeks about $5 billion in fresh money on top of a similar amount earmarked earlier in the year.

item.title: Hamas Partially Accepts Trump’s Peace Plan
item.description: Hamas said it would release all Israeli hostages but wants to negotiate elements of President Trump’s peace plan for Gaza. Adam Rasgon, a reporter for...

item.title: Trapped in the Homes They Thought Would Protect Them
item.description: Some victims of the Cebu earthquake in the Philippines lived in homes that were supposed to withstand natural disasters.

item.title: At a Protest for a Deal, Israelis Wrestle With a Mix of Emotions
item.description: Along with optimism that President Trump can lock Israel and Hamas into a deal, many expressed anxiety about being disappointed once more.
